Trade/Device Name(s): GDH Professional Blood Glucose Monitoring System
GDH Professional LED Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GDH Professional and GDH Professional LED Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary and venous whole blood from multiple sites for professional multiple-patient use to aid in monitoring diabetes control, not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
